mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (BOOKMARK_NO, SCHEDULE_ID, USER_NO, BOOKMARK_DATE, CONTENTYPEID, ORIGINIMGURL) VALUES ( BOOKMARK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{contentid}, ( SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{userid} ), SYSDATE, #{contenttypeid}, #{image} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ( SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID = #{user_id} ) AND SCHEDULE_ID = #{contentid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE USER_NO = ( SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} ) AND ( SCHEDULE_ID = #{contentid} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM COMMENTS CMT INNER JOIN USERS U ON CMT.user_no = U.user_no WHERE CMT.CONTENTID = #{contentId} ORDER BY COMMENT_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS (COMMENT_NO, MAPP_STYPE, COMMENT_CONTENT, USER_NO, COMMENT_DATE, CONTENTID) VALUES ( COMMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 1002, #{content}, ( SELECT USER_NO FROM USERS WHERE USER_ID=#{user_id} ), SYSDATE, #{contentid} )
